Html:
I can't get the VR player to just play a video. I installed VLC and I can see a still of the video but when you hit play it never moves. No crashing the play bar just fills up and nothing moves. Sometime there is a small shutter in the image like it went from frame one to two but thats it.

Thanks
I had the same situation before. It turned out I was using a 64bit VLC player. Change it back to 32bit will do.
